infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app needs speech recognition to detect filler words in your speech.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to detect filler words in your speech and provide real-time vibration feedback.

plugins.microphonePermission: This app needs microphone access to detect filler words in your speech and provide real-time vibration feedback.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: This app needs speech recognition to detect filler words in your speech.
